verses.name: Judges 5:6
verses.text: In the days of Shamgar the son of Anath, in the days of Jael, the highways were unoccupied, and the travellers walked through byways.

verses.name: Judges 5:7
verses.text: The inhabitants of the villages ceased, they ceased in Israel, until that I Deborah arose, that I arose a mother in Israel.

verses.name: Judges 5:8
verses.text: They chose new gods; then was war in the gates: was there a shield or spear seen among forty thousand in Israel?

verses.name: Judges 5:9
verses.text: My heart is toward the governors of Israel, that offered themselves willingly among the people. Bless ye the Lord.
